title: Inception
description: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief who steals secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state. His rare ability has made him a coveted player in corporate espionage, but has also cost him everything he loves. Cobb gets a chance at redemption when offered a seemingly impossible task: planting an idea into someone's mind — inception. If he succeeds, it could be the perfect crime.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Set over a decade after the events of the first film, Jake Sully and Neytiri have built a family on the lush moon of Pandora. But when a resurgent threat from Earth arrives, they must rally their Na'vi allies and protect their home from annihilation in a visually breathtaking underwater journey.

title: Oppenheimer
description: Oppenheimer follows the complex life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the brilliant theoretical physicist who led the Manhattan Project during World War II. As he grapples with the ethical dilemmas of nuclear warfare, the film explores his rise to fame, subsequent political downfall, and lasting legacy on history.

title: Interstellar
description: In a dystopian future, Earth is on the brink of collapse. A group of astronauts, led by Cooper, travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new habitable planet. Interstellar is a grand journey of survival, time dilation, and love that transcends dimensions.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides, a gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his people. As malevolent forces clash over the planet’s exclusive supply of Spice, Paul’s fate becomes interwoven with the survival of humanity.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick is hunted by the world’s most dangerous assassins after a massive bounty is placed on his head. In this fourth chapter, he uncovers a way to defeat the High Table but must first face powerful adversaries across cities and continents, all while staying one step ahead of death.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill must rally the Guardians to protect one of their own from a mysterious new enemy. As their mission unfolds, secrets are revealed, bonds are tested, and the fate of the galaxy once again hangs in the balance.

title: Nope
description: After a series of mysterious events unfold in their California town, ranch owners OJ and Emerald discover something terrifying in the skies. Nope blends horror and science fiction as the siblings try to capture evidence of a UFO, all while unraveling chilling truths.

title: The Batman
description: Bruce Wayne uncovers deep corruption in Gotham while investigating a sadistic killer known as the Riddler. In this gritty detective thriller, Batman faces moral dilemmas, political deceit, and his own trauma as he transforms into the symbol of justice Gotham desperately needs.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker’s identity is exposed, throwing his world into chaos. In an attempt to fix it, he seeks help from Doctor Strange, but their spell goes wrong, breaking open the multiverse. Now, Peter must face threats from alternate realities and learn what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: The Matrix
description: Neo, a computer hacker, is led to uncover the truth about the Matrix—a simulated reality controlled by sentient machines. As he joins a rebellion against the system, he discovers his fate as 'The One' and begins a journey that bends reality, time, and belief.

title: Tenet
description: In a twilight world of international espionage, an unnamed protagonist is armed with the mysterious word 'Tenet' as he fights to prevent World War III. He must navigate a world where objects and people can move backward through time in a gripping, high-concept thriller.

title: The Flash
description: Barry Allen uses his superpowers to travel back in time to save his mother, inadvertently altering the timeline and creating a world without superheroes. Now, with the multiverse at risk, Barry must race to fix the past and restore reality, encountering different versions of familiar heroes.

title: Barbie
description: Barbie and Ken live in a perfect world until Barbie begins to question her existence. To find answers, she ventures into the real world, confronting stereotypes, corporate greed, and personal growth in this satirical and empowering comedy.

title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team face their biggest threat yet: a powerful AI known as 'The Entity' that threatens global stability. As they travel across continents to prevent a catastrophe, alliances are tested and the cost of saving the world becomes personal.
